page.title: 09INDUSTRY
page.content: Although the immediate visual impression of the area is one of solely agricultural activity there is nevertheless a considerable industrial presence.However that presence is less today (l985) than it was even 10 years ago. Industrial activity today is principally Primary in nature - Quarrying and Forestry. Quarries - in use or abandonned are found throughout the area:they are sand and gravel quarries working fluvio-glacial deposits (eskers). Forestry is less important and is mainly private plantations linked with farms and not with the Forestry Commission. These plantations provide the farmers with their timber needs - fencing etc. Associated with these two industries and also farming are minor activities
